In the Energy Transition, there are only three possible paths:

1. Policy slows down to match technology.

2. Technology speeds up to match policy

3. Desperate fed-up voters force #1.  

We are clearly in the early innings of path #3

https://t.co/dTtdBcBbMK

1. introduce legislation to shape energy transition eg UK phasing out petrol cars by 2040
2. level playing field for public & private cos. Private cos must also improve on sustainability efforts. Risk of public cos divesting assets to private ownership 3/9
